attributes.review: After downloading this app my phone got multiple viruses & deleted all my photos & messages. I had to go to a phone repair shop to get it fixed & while I was there, my daughter got hit by a car & I was not there to save her. This app caused me to lose my first born! Highly disappointed .. will be voting Trump out this year ...
attributes.title: HACKERS !!!

attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded the app and signed in ALL of my social media accounts were hacked as well as my email and Apple pay account. I finally have everything back to normal now but for y’all’s safety PLEASE do NOT download this app. Also, rate this app 1 star so it can get taken down and know one else's info can get hacked and stollen.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app, it took several hours. And people say how fast this loads smh. Then once it FINALLY loaded, I was introduced with so many ads. I couldn’t take it. Then once there was break from all those stupid ads, it crashed. If your gonna make a app, at least put effort into it. Like jeez
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Loads time are slow and when you want to but stuff it just sends you to the website! WASTE! Such a shame we definitely deserve better. Also does not respect my dark theme on phone which makes me suspect the app is STEALING DATA where it shouldn’t! Absolutely awful, just the worst experience with a political app ever. UNINSTALLED.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Horrible experience, took 30 min to download and immediately crashed. So bad its a disgrace, absolutely the worst, horrible, so bad, not good, bad bad, made me unhappy. Overall 0/10 experience, always lagging, if i could give it 0 stars i would 😤😤 overall really bad i recommend deleting immediately!
attributes.title: ✨😍🧚🏻‍♀️💞 absolutely feral :) 💖💫🌟🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🥰

attributes.review: This app is so confusing and hard to use! Not user friendly! The buttons are too small and when I manage to finally click a button the app crashes. I feel like my whole phone is slower from using this trash app!
attributes.title: So disappointed in this app ):

attributes.review: When I opened the app it took my phone and completely whipped my phone I had to go to my cat who loved the president when they opened the app they were horrified to see an orange cheese it on screen they fixed it and got rid of the app they hated it so so so so much. Tldr phone whipped cat fixed they hate the president. Thank you for your time. 🙃
attributes.title: Grosssss

attributes.review: This app is a piece of garbage, much like our president. Actually, this app serves as a VERY ACCURATE representation of our dear Mr. President in that it is impossible to understand how the d*mn thing functions. It took years to download and when it finally did, it kept crashing!!! This guy can’t even get an app to work properly, much less an entire country!!!
attributes.title: GARBAGE LIKE THE MAN HIMSELF

attributes.review: You would think an app made for the President would be good. My 13 year old brother can develop an app better than this garbage. The performance of the application is terrible and there are plenty of bugs. The app also steals the data from your phone for the developers own personal gain
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I was SO excited for this app but it took a MONTH to download, and once I could FINALLY open it the app was nothing but pictures of Trump’s tiny orange chub!!! VERY INAPPROPRIATE and UNCHRISTIAN 😡 I don’t know what libtard made this app, but MY President would NEVER have their privates exposed for children to see because he is a man of GOD ✝️😇 until this app gets fixed to show the REAL President, I’m uninstalling 😤
attributes.title: VERY UNCHRISTIAN!!!
